p: Coronaviruses are important human and animal pathogens. During epidemics, they are the cause of up to one-third of community-acquired upper respiratory tract infections in adults and probably play a role in severe respiratory infections in both children and adults. In addition, it is possible that certain coronaviruses cause diarrhoea in infants and children. However, coronaviruses are responsible of only a little amount of diagnosed pneumonia and acute severe ill especially in younger population and very often a coinfection is detected in hospitalized patients. Usually the infection is responsible of mild to moderate symptoms which rapidly spontaneously resolved [1].
